item.title: Sequel Pro v0.9.8.1
item.description:
Sequel Pro 0.9.8.1 is now available.

This build is mainly a bug fix release and is recommended for all users. It should provide improved stability and consistency.

Full release notes are available here: http://www.sequelpro.com/release-notes.html

item.title: Sequel Pro v0.9.8
item.description:
Sequel Pro 0.9.8 is now available.

Highlights of the new features in this version are: user management, table triggers support, custom query placeholder support including lists, custom query text macros and tab triggers, much improved custom query autocomplete including table and field names, an overhauled CSV mapping interface including defaults and updates, improved printing support, a 64 bit build, and much improved stability including the addition of a crash reporter.

Full release notes are available here: http://www.sequelpro.com/release-notes.html

item.title: Sequel Pro v0.9.7
item.description:
Sequel Pro 0.9.7 is now available.

Highlights of the new features in this version are: a new server processes panel, a query favourites editor, a filter editor, improved tooltips including image previews, a pagination interface for the content view, much faster and more stable import and export, early support for document-based connections, the ability to stop custom query and content loads, and the introduction of threading for some tasks.

Full release notes are available here: http://www.sequelpro.com/release-notes.html

item.title: Sequel Pro v0.9.6
item.description:
Sequel Pro 0.9.6 is now available.

Highlights of the new features in this version are: overhauled connection including SSH tunnel support, updated interface, filterable tables list, foreign key support, sortable and editable custom query results, native MySQL help support and significant speed and memory usage improvements.

Full release notes are available here: http://www.sequelpro.com/release-notes.html

item.title: Sequel Pro v0.9.5
item.description:
Sequel Pro 0.9.5 is now available.

Here it is — The release you have been waiting for!

Some highlights are:

  • The import issues experienced since 0.9.4 have been resolved.
  • Interface across all windows have been cleaned up to have a more consistent OS X look and feel
  • The preferences have been redesigned from the ground up.
  • The auto-updating framework has been updated. Avoids a number of previous problems.
  • Connection window redesigned functionality wise.
  • Query editor now has syntax colouring, line numbers, and whole host of other goodies
  • Console window has live filtering as well as export.
  • Printing now automatically paginates and supports page set up
  • Various memory leaks and bug fixes
  • ... and many more

Full release notes are available here: http://www.sequelpro.com/release-notes.html

item.title: Sequel Pro v0.9.4
item.description:
Sequel Pro 0.9.4 is now available.

This update brings a whole host of user interface improvements and bugfixes.

Some highlights are:

  • improved performance over slow connections
  • added pagination to large result sets
  • console now has it’s own window
  • improved user experience when editing/adding new rows
  • improved auto-completion when writing queries
  • better handling of connection dropouts
  • improved import/export and encoding handling
  • misc other improvements and fixes

Full release notes are available here: http://www.sequelpro.com/release-notes.html

item.title: Sequel Pro v0.9.3
item.description:
The latest stable version of Sequel Pro is v0.9.3, which was released on December 20, 2008.

Sequel Pro 0.9.3 contains a bunch of usability and bugfixes. Exporting data is now dramatically faster, the favourites system has received a few improvements and working with large data sets is now more efficient. See the ReleaseNotes for a full list of changes.

item.title: Sequel Pro v0.9.2
item.description:
The latest stable version of Sequel Pro is v0.9.2, which was released on October 21, 2008.

Sequel Pro 0.9.2 provides a few bugfixes, a couple of usability fixes and some user interface cleanup. See the ReleaseNotes for a full list of changes.

item.title: Sequel Pro v0.9.1
item.description:
The latest stable version of Sequel Pro is v0.9.1, which was released on September 17, 2008.

Sequel Pro 0.9.1 adds several user interface improvements and a few bugfixes, see the ReleaseNotes for a full list of changes.

item.title: Sequel Pro v0.9
item.description:
The latest stable version of Sequel Pro is v0.9, which was released on August 6, 2008.

Sequel Pro 0.9 adds a new interface lift and a few new features. The source code has also had been cleaned up in a few areas.

Note that the new Table Information Pane is disabled for the time being until a remaining bug has been resolved.
